sentences.english: Third category called" little wife" middle, be a yes-man, like a doormat.
sentences.chinese: 第三类叫“小媳妇型”中层，唯唯诺诺，像个受气包。

sentences.english: She likes the submissive person,and doesn't hear any advices.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢唯唯诺诺的人，根本听不进所有其他人的劝告。

sentences.english: I don't know why there are all yes-men around me.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道为什么人我身边都是些唯唯诺诺的人。

sentences.english: She likes those yes men and never accept others' advices.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢唯唯诺诺的人，根本听不进所有其他人的劝告。

sentences.english: He stood aside meekly when the new policy was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 当有人提出新政策时，他唯唯诺诺地站在一旁。

sentences.english: She likes yesmen and never takes the advices from all other people.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢唯唯诺诺的人，根本听不进所有其他人的劝告。

sentences.english: The Government, compliant as ever, gave in to their demands.
sentences.chinese: 同往常一样唯唯诺诺，对他们的要求作出让步。

sentences.english: I'm told he's only a yes-man.
sentences.chinese: 我听说他是个唯唯诺诺的人。

sentences.english: He's useless at his job and only got promoted because he's a yes-man.
sentences.chinese: 他没有才能，能升职只因为他是个唯唯诺诺的人。

sentences.english: No matter where he worked, he always kowtowed to his superior.
sentences.chinese: 不论他到哪儿工作，都对他的上级唯唯诺诺。

sentences.english: Followership You don't have to be a spineless5) yes-person to be a good follower.
sentences.chinese: 服从精神你无须凡事唯唯诺诺才算是一名好的追随者。

sentences.english: He compared the situation to a marriage in which the wife was bossing around her henpecked husband.
sentences.chinese: 他将之比作婚姻关系，妻子颐指气使而丈夫唯唯诺诺。

definition: trembling with fear/with fear and trepidation
in fear and trepidation (idiom); in reverence before your majesty (court formula of humility)
to bow and bend the knee (idiom); fawning/bending and scraping to curry favor
bowed head and ears glued (idiom); docile and obedient/at sb's beck and call
afraid of the head, terrified of the tail (idiom); ever fearful and nervous/afraid of the slightest thing
to nod one's head and bow (idiom); bowing and scraping/unctuous fawning
